text: Anata gata wa shito no yobikake o, anata gata sōgo-kan no yobikake no yō ni shite wa naranai. Arrā wa anata gata no naka, hisokani nukedasu mono o shitte ora reru. Sorede, kare (arrā) no meirei ni ihan suru mono wa shiren ga kudari, matawa itamashī chōbatsu ga kase rarerukara, yōjin sa se nasai
